resources.string: “We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, therefore, is not an act, but a habit.”\n— Aristotle
“Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.”\n― Oscar Wilde
“You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough.”\n― Mae West
“Be the change that you wish to see in the world.”\n― Mahatma Gandhi
“No one can make you feel inferior without your consent.”\n― Eleanor Roosevelt
"“If you tell the truth, you don't have to remember anything.”\n― Mark Twain"
“Whatever you do, do it well.”\n― Walt Disney
“Determine your priorities and focus on them.”\n― Eileen McDargh
“Yesterday you said tomorrow. Just do it.”\n― Nike
“Be so happy that when others look at you, they become happy too”
“Try to be a rainbow in someone’s cloud.”\n― Maya Angelou
“What consumes your mind controls your life”\n― Unknown
“May your choices reflect your hopes, not your fears.”\n― Nelson Mandela
“It hurt because it mattered.”\n― John Green
“Done is better than perfect”\n― Sheryl Sandberg
